LOCAL.%xOverkillDamage.label: %x Overkill Damage
LOCAL.abilities.label: Abilities
LOCAL.accuracy.baseValue.label: Base Accuracy = (Mind + Training in Ranged Weapons) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.accuracy.desc.label:
Accuracy measures your effectiveness with ranged attacks, and affects the Difficulty of ranged attacks you make.

Your Accuracy is equal to 1/2 your Mind + Training in Ranged Weapons.
LOCAL.accuracy.label: Accuracy
LOCAL.accuracy.value.label: Total Accuracy Rating

LOCAL.arcana.desc.label: Arcana measures how much you know about arcane magic and creatures.
LOCAL.arcana.label: Arcana
LOCAL.armor.base.label: Equipped Armor
LOCAL.armor.desc.label:
Armor decreases the amount of Damage taken when you are hit by attacks and spells.

Your Armor is determined by what gear, effects, and abilities you possess.
LOCAL.armor.encumbering.desc.label: When wearing armor with the Encumbering trait, you have Disadvantage on checks to Swim, Fly, or Climb.
LOCAL.armor.heavy.desc.label: While wearing Heavy armor, all your speeds are decreased by -1, and you have Greater Disadvantage on checks to Swim, Fly, or Climb. You cannot Jump while wearing Heavy armor.
LOCAL.armor.label: Armor
LOCAL.armor.loud.desc.label: When wearing armor with the Loud trait, you have Disadvantage on checks to remain undetected by creatures with hearing.
LOCAL.armor.magical.desc.label: Magical armor and shields cannot be destroyed by non-magical Rend attacks.
LOCAL.armorIgnored.label: Armor Ignored
LOCAL.armorTrait.label: Armor Trait
LOCAL.aspectCosts.label: Aspect Costs
LOCAL.athletics.desc.label: Athletics is your ability to perform acts of physical prowess.
LOCAL.athletics.label: Athletics
LOCAL.attack.blast.desc.label:
Blast attacks apply their damage to all unobstructed creatures within the listed Blast radius of the center of the attack.

For example, an attack with Blast 1 would damage all unobstructed creatures within 1 space of the center of the attack.
LOCAL.attack.cleave.desc.label: Each roll of 6 on an attack with the Cleave trait deals 1 Damage to all other enemies adjacent to the attacker.
LOCAL.attack.close.desc.label: Ranged attacks with the Close trait do not suffer a penalty to Accuracy when attacking an adjacent enemy.
LOCAL.attack.crushing.desc.label: A Crushing attack is heavy and solid, and deals bludgeoning blows to enemies.
LOCAL.attack.flurry.desc.label: Attacks with the Flurry trait round up when splitting their dice pool in half for Multi-Attacks.
LOCAL.attack.ineffective.desc.label: Armor is doubled against Ineffective attacks, and Ineffective attacks can only inflict 1 Wound per attack.
LOCAL.attack.label: Attack
LOCAL.attack.loud.desc.label: An attack with the Loud trait alerts everyone within hearing range when it is used.
LOCAL.attack.magical.desc.label: Magical attacks are effective against magical defenses, and can destroy Magical items.
LOCAL.attack.push.desc.label: If you hit and deal damage on an attack with the Push trait, you may move the target 1 space away from you, provided it is no more than 1 Size larger than you.
LOCAL.attack.penetrating.desc.label: Penetrating attacks ignore 1 point of Armor.
LOCAL.attack.piercing.desc.label: Piercing attacks use a sharp point or tip to stab and skewer enemies.
LOCAL.attack.reload.desc.label: Attacks with the Reload trait require an Action to be reloaded after an attack before they can be used again.
LOCAL.attack.rend.desc.label:
Each roll of 6 with a Rend attack destroys 1 point of Armor after the damage is applied.

Magical armor can only be destroyed by Magical weapons.
LOCAL.attack.restraining.desc.label: When a Restraining attack deals to a creature up to 1 Size larger than the attacker, that creature is Restrained until it uses an Action to free itself.
LOCAL.attack.slashing.desc.label: A Slashing attack is sharp and typically bladed, and is used to cut enemies open.
LOCAL.attack.splash.desc.label: Attacks with the Splash trait apply half their damage to all unobstructed creatures adjacent to the target.
LOCAL.attack.twoHanded.desc.label: A Two-Handed attack requires at least two hands to use.
LOCAL.attack.vicious.desc.label: When a Vicious attack inflicts Wounds, the number of Wounds inflicted increases by +1.
LOCAL.attackCheck.label: Attack Check
LOCAL.attackNotes.label: Attack Notes
LOCAL.attackTrait.label: Attack Trait
LOCAL.attackType.label: Attack Type
LOCAL.attackerAccuracy.label: Attacker Accuracy
LOCAL.attackerMelee.label: Attacker Melee
LOCAL.attacks.label: Attacks
LOCAL.attemptedToSpend%xResolve.label: Attempted to Spend %x Resolve
LOCAL.attribute.label: Attribute
LOCAL.attributeCheck.label: Attribute Check
LOCAL.autoCalculateDC.label: Auto-Calculate DC
LOCAL.awareness.baseValue.label: Base Awareness = (Mind + Training in Perception) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.awareness.desc.label:
Awareness is your passive alertness and attention to detail.

Your Awareness is equal to 1/2 your Mind + your Training in Perception.
LOCAL.awareness.label: Awareness
LOCAL.awareness.value.label: Total Awareness Rating
LOCAL.base.label: Base
LOCAL.baseDamage.label: Base Damage
LOCAL.blast.label: Blast
LOCAL.blindCheck.desc.label: Privately rolled a check.
LOCAL.blinded.desc.label:
A Blinded creature cannot see.

A Blinded creature automatically fails any Awareness and Perception checks that rely on sight.

A Blinded creature's Melee, Accuracy, and Defense decrease by -1.
LOCAL.blinded.label: Blinded
LOCAL.body.desc.label:
Body is your overall strength, speed, and coordination. Characters with a high Body tend to do well in a physical fight and excel at manual labor.

Body affects your Melee (your effectiveness in close combat) and your Defense (your ability to avoid damage).

Body also greatly affects your Resilience (your ability to endure pain and resist illnesses) and slightly affects your Reflexes (your ability to duck, dodge, and avoid sudden danger).
LOCAL.body.label: Body
LOCAL.body.value.label: Total Body
LOCAL.bonusPenaltyDice.label: Bonus / Penalty Dice
LOCAL.burrow.desc.label: Burrow is the ability to move by digging through the ground.
LOCAL.burrow.label: Burrow
LOCAL.burrow.value.label: Total Burrow Speed
LOCAL.calculateSuccessCost.label: Calculate Success Cost
LOCAL.cancel.label: Cancel
LOCAL.castingCheck.label: Casting Check

LOCAL.close.label: Close

LOCAL.confirmRegenerateUUID.label: Are you sure you want to regenerate this documents's Unique ID? This will break any macros that were created for this document using the Unique ID Method.
LOCAL.confirmRemoveExpiredEffects.label: Are you sure you want to remove all expired effects from this actor?
LOCAL.contaminated.desc.label: A Contaminated creature has a -1 penalty to all Attributes and Resistances.

Bonuses and penalties to damage dealt.

LOCAL.damageTaken.label: Damage Taken
LOCAL.damageReducedBy.label: Damage Reduced By
LOCAL.dc.label: DC
LOCAL.dead.desc.label: A Dead creature can take no actions of any kind.
LOCAL.dead.label: Dead
LOCAL.deafened.desc.label:
A Deafened creature cannot hear.

A Deafened automatically fails any Awareness and Perception checks that rely on hearing.
LOCAL.deafened.label: Deafened
LOCAL.deception.desc.label: Deception is your ability to lie and mislead.
LOCAL.deception.label: Deception

LOCAL.defense.baseValue.label: Base Defense = (Body + Training in Dexterity) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.defense.desc.label:
Defense is your ability to defend against attacks, and affects the Difficulty of attacks made against you.

Your Defense is equal to 1/2 your Body + Training in Dexterity.
LOCAL.defense.label: Defense
LOCAL.defense.value.label: Total Defense Rating

LOCAL.deleteTrait.label: Delete Trait

LOCAL.details.label: Details
LOCAL.dexterity.desc.label: Dexterity measures your ability to perform tasks requiring coordination, grace, and flexibility.
LOCAL.dexterity.label: Dexterity

LOCAL.difficulty.label: Difficulty
LOCAL.diplomacy.desc.label: Diplomacy allows you to influence others through negotiation and flattery.

LOCAL.editUUID.desc.label:
WARNING: The Unique ID of a document is generated by the TITAN System when a document is created. It does not change if the document is edited or duplicated, and is can optionally be used to identify a document for user-created macros.

Editing the Unique ID will break macros created using the Unqiue ID Identify method, unless you update the macros to use the new Unique ID.

You may want to do this if have duplicated a document as base for other documents, if you want to prevent macros from identifying the duplicates as the original.
LOCAL.editUUID.label: Edit Unique ID
LOCAL.editedUUIDForDocument%x.label: Edited Unique ID for document: %x
LOCAL.effect.custom.desc.label: Effect lasts for a Custom duration.
LOCAL.effect.expired.desc.label: Effect has Expired
LOCAL.effect.initiative.desc.label: Effect duration progresses on a given Initiative in turn order.
LOCAL.effect.label: Effect
LOCAL.effect.permanent.desc.label: Effect is Permanent until it is removed.

LOCAL.encumbering.label: Encumbering
LOCAL.engineering.desc.label: Engineering is your ability to create, understand, and repair complex items.
LOCAL.engineering.label: Engineering
LOCAL.equip.label: Equip
LOCAL.equipment.label: Equipment
LOCAL.equipped.label: Equipped
LOCAL.expertise.desc.label: Each point of Expertise allows you to increase the result of a dice rolled with this Skill.
LOCAL.expertise.label: Expertise
LOCAL.expertiseDoubled.label: Expertise Doubled
LOCAL.expertiseMod.label: Expertise Bonus / Penalty

LOCAL.fastHealing.desc.label: While affected by Fast Healing, a combatant will heal the designated amount every turn.
LOCAL.fastHealing.label: Fast Healing
LOCAL.filter.label: Filter
LOCAL.flatModifier.label: Flat Modifier
LOCAL.flurry.label: Flurry
LOCAL.fly.desc.label: Fly is the ability to move by soaring through the atmosphere.
LOCAL.fly.label: Fly
LOCAL.fly.value.label: Total Fly Speed
LOCAL.frightened.desc.label:
A Frightened creature cannot willingly move closer to the source of their fear.

While the creature can detect the source of its fear, it suffers a -1 dice penalty to all checks.
LOCAL.frightened.label: Frightened
LOCAL.grip.label: Grip
LOCAL.heal%xDamage.label: Heal %x Damage
LOCAL.healed%xDamage.label: Healed %x Damage
LOCAL.healed%xWounds.label: Healed %x Wounds
LOCAL.healing.desc.label:
Bonuses and penalties to healing performed.

Determined by what gear, effects, and abilities you possess.
LOCAL.healing.label: Healing
LOCAL.heavy.armor.label: Heavy
LOCAL.heavy.label: Heavy
LOCAL.idMethod.desc.label:
This is the method by which the macro will attempt to identify the item.

Unique ID - The item will be identified by its unique ID that is generated on item creation. Compatible across actors, but may mis-identify items that were duplicated from others without regenerating their Unique ID.

Item Name - The item will be identified by the name of the item. Compatible across actors, but may mis-identify items that use the same name.

Item ID - The item will be identified by the ID of the item given to it by Foundry. Not compatible across actors, but will never mis-identify an item.
LOCAL.idMethod.label: ID Method
LOCAL.ignoreArmor.label: Ignore Armor
LOCAL.import.label: Import
LOCAL.incapacitated.desc.label:
An Incapacitated creature cannot Move, take Actions, or spend Resolve.

Incapacitated creatures cannot defend themselves. The Difficulty to hit an Incapacitated creature is always 2, and they automatically fail Reflexes checks.
LOCAL.incapacitated.label: Incapacitated
LOCAL.increase.label: Increase
LOCAL.increaseAttribute.label: Increase Attribute
LOCAL.increaseMod.label: Increase Mod
LOCAL.increaseRating.label: Increase Rating
LOCAL.increaseResistance.label: Increase Resistance

LOCAL.increaseSpeed.label: Increase Speed
LOCAL.ineffective.label: Ineffective
LOCAL.inflictCondition.label: Inflict Conditions
LOCAL.initialValue.label: Initial Value
LOCAL.initiative.baseValue.label: Base Initiative = (Mind + Training in Perception & Dexterity) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.initiative.desc.label:
Initiative is your general readiness, and determines your turn order in combat.

Initiative is affected by your Mind and your Training in Perception.
LOCAL.initiative.label: Initiative
LOCAL.initiative.value.label: Total Initiative Rating
LOCAL.inspiration.desc.label:
Inspiration is given as a reward for role-play.

You can spend your Inspiration to:

  • Gain Advantage on a Check

  • Recover from Dying at the start of your turn

  • Immediately regain 1 Resolve
LOCAL.instant.label: Instant
LOCAL.intimidation.desc.label: Intimidation allows you to bend others to your will using threats.
LOCAL.intimidation.label: Intimidation
LOCAL.invalidRulesElement.label: INVALID RULES ELEMENT
LOCAL.inventory.label: Inventory
LOCAL.investigation.desc.label: Investigation measures your ability to find and make deductions from clues.
LOCAL.investigation.label: Investigation
LOCAL.itemCheck.label: Item Check
LOCAL.itemDescription.label: Item Description
LOCAL.itemId.label: Item ID
LOCAL.itemName.label: Item Name
LOCAL.itemUuid.label: Item Unique ID

LOCAL.long.label: Long
LOCAL.longRest.label: Long Rest
LOCAL.longRest.desc.label: Completing a Long Rest fully restores your Stamina and Resolve, and decreases your Wounds by -1.
LOCAL.lore.desc.label: Lore measures your overall depth of knowledge in topics you are familiar with.
LOCAL.lore.label: Lore
LOCAL.lost%xArmor.label: Lost %x Armor
LOCAL.loud.label: Loud
LOCAL.m10.label: 10m
LOCAL.m10Radius.label: 10m (radius)
LOCAL.m30.label: 30m
LOCAL.m5.label: 5m
LOCAL.m50.label: 50m
LOCAL.m5Radius.label: 5m (radius)

LOCAL.max.label: Max Value
LOCAL.medicine.desc.label: Medicine is your ability to patch up wounds and treat diseases and poisons.
LOCAL.medicine.label: Medicine
LOCAL.medium.label: Medium
LOCAL.melee.baseValue.label: Base Melee = (Body + Training in Melee Weapons) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.melee.desc.label:
Melee measures your effectiveness with close-range attacks, and affects the Difficulty of melee attacks you make.

Your Melee is equal to 1/2 your Body + Training in Melee Weapons.
LOCAL.melee.label: Melee
LOCAL.melee.value.label: Total Melee Rating
LOCAL.meleeWeapons.desc.label: Melee Weapons measures your proficiency with close-range weapons.
LOCAL.meleeWeapons.label: Melee Weapons
LOCAL.metaphysics.desc.label: Metaphysics measures your overall understanding of spiritual concepts and creatures.
LOCAL.metaphysics.label: Metaphysics
LOCAL.minValue.label: Min Value
LOCAL.mind.desc.label:
Mind represents your intelligence, your awareness, and your ability to think on your feet. Characters with a high Mind are often inquisitive, quick witted, and adept at thinking their way around a problem.

Mind affects your Accuracy (your ability with ranged weapons), your Initiative (how quickly your turn comes in combat), and your Awareness of your surroundings.

Mind also greatly affects your Reflexes (your ability to duck, dodge, and avoid sudden danger) and slightly affects your Willpower (your ability to resist mental attacks).
LOCAL.mind.label: Mind
LOCAL.mind.value.label: Total Mind
LOCAL.minion.label: Minion
LOCAL.minutes.label: Minutes
LOCAL.mod.label: Mod
LOCAL.mulBase.label: Mul Base
LOCAL.multi.label: Multi
LOCAL.multiAttack.label: Multi-Attack
LOCAL.name.label: Name
LOCAL.nature.desc.label: Nature measures how much you know about the natural world, and your ability to command and train beasts.
LOCAL.nature.label: Nature
LOCAL.need%xMoreResolve.label: Need %x more Resolve

LOCAL.passive.label: Passive
LOCAL.penetrating.label: Penetrating
LOCAL.perception.desc.label: Perception measures your ability to be aware of your environment and find hidden details.
LOCAL.perception.label: Perception
LOCAL.performance.desc.label: Performance is your ability to act in character or entertain an audience.
LOCAL.performance.label: Performance
LOCAL.period.label: Period
LOCAL.permanent.label: Permanent
LOCAL.persistentDamage.desc.label: While affected by Persistent Damage, a combatant will take the designated amount of damage every turn.
LOCAL.persistentDamage.label: Persistent Damage
LOCAL.piercing.label: Piercing
LOCAL.push.label: Push
LOCAL.prone.desc.label:
A Prone creature has their speed reduced by half, rounded up.

The creature's Melee and Accuracy are decreased by -1.

A creature attacking a Prone within 1 space increases their Melee or Accuracy by +1.

A creature attacking a Prone target at a distance greater than 1 space decreases their Accuracy by -1 per 10 spaces, rounded down.

Standing up from Prone may be done with a Move or an Action.
LOCAL.prone.label: Prone
LOCAL.prototypeToken.label: Prototype Token
LOCAL.quantity.label: Quantity
LOCAL.radius.label: Radius
LOCAL.range.label: Range
LOCAL.ranged.label: Ranged
LOCAL.rangedWeapons.desc.label: Ranged Weapons measures your proficiency with ranged weapons in combat.
LOCAL.rangedWeapons.label: Ranged Weapons
LOCAL.rare.label: Rare
LOCAL.rarity.label: Rarity
LOCAL.rating.label: Rating
LOCAL.reRollFailures.label: Re-roll Failures
LOCAL.reRollFailuresSpendResolve.label: Re-roll Failures (Spend 1 Resolve)
LOCAL.reaction.label: Reaction
LOCAL.reflexes.baseValue.label: Base Reflexes = Mind + (Body / 2), rounded down.
LOCAL.reflexes.desc.label:
Reflexes is your ability to duck, dodge, and avoid sudden danger.

Reflexes are greatly affected by your Mind and slightly affected by your Body.
LOCAL.reflexes.label: Reflexes
LOCAL.reflexes.value.label: Total Reflexes

LOCAL.repair.label: Repair

LOCAL.repaired%xArmor.label: Repaired %x Armor
LOCAL.resilience.baseValue.label: Base Resilience = Body + (Soul / 2), rounded down.
LOCAL.resilience.desc.label:
Resilience is your ability to endure pain and resist illnesses.

Resilience is greatly affected by your Body and slightly affected by your Soul.
LOCAL.resilience.label: Resilience
LOCAL.resilience.value.label: Total Resilience
LOCAL.resistance.label: Resistance
LOCAL.resistanceCheck.label: Resistance Check
LOCAL.resistances.label: Resistances
LOCAL.resisted%xDamage.label: Resisted %x Damage
LOCAL.resisted%xRend.label: Resisted %x Rend
LOCAL.resistedBy.label: Resisted by
LOCAL.resolve.label: Resolve
LOCAL.resolve.max.label: Max Resolve = Soul
LOCAL.resolve.desc.label:
Resolve is your ability to push yourself beyond your normal limits.

1 Resolve is regained at the start of your turn in Combat.

You may spend Resolve during Combat to:

  • Perform an extra Action

    .

  • Use an Ability that requires Resolve.

  • Reroll failures on a Check.

  • Double your Training on a check, before the roll is made.

  • Double your Expertise on a check, before or after the roll is made.
LOCAL.resolveCost.label: Resolve Cost
LOCAL.resolveFullyRestored.label: Resolve Fully Restored
LOCAL.resolveRegain.label: Resolve Regain
LOCAL.resource.label: Resource
LOCAL.restrained.desc.label:
A Restrained creature cannot move.

Additionally, their Melee, Accuracy, and Defense decrease by -1, and they automatically fail Reflexes checks.
LOCAL.restrained.label: Restrained
LOCAL.restraining.label: Restraining
LOCAL.role.label: Role
LOCAL.roll.label: Roll
LOCAL.rollMessage.label: Roll Message
LOCAL.round.label: Round
LOCAL.rounds.label: Rounds
LOCAL.rulesElements.label: Rules Elements
LOCAL.save.label: Save
LOCAL.scaling.label: Scaling
LOCAL.self.label: Self
LOCAL.sendToChat.label: Send to Chat
LOCAL.sense.label: Sense
LOCAL.shield.label: Shield
LOCAL.shieldTrait.label: Shield Trait
LOCAL.short.label: Short
LOCAL.shortRest.label: Short Rest
LOCAL.shortRest.desc.label: Completing a Short Rest fully restores your Stamina and Resolve.
LOCAL.single.label: Single
LOCAL.skill.label: Skill
LOCAL.skill.totalDice.label: Total Dice used when rolling this Skill.
LOCAL.skillCheck.label: Skill Check
LOCAL.skills.label: Skills
LOCAL.slashing.label: Slashing
LOCAL.sleeping.desc.label: A Sleeping creature has its Awareness reduced by half, rounded up.
LOCAL.sleeping.label: Sleeping
LOCAL.soul.desc.label:
Soul represents your determination, sense of self, and spiritual power. Characters with a high Soul are frequently leaders, champions, and orators.

Soul affects your Resolve (your ability to take extra actions or enhance your actions in combat).

Soul also greatly affects your Willpower (your ability to resist mental attacks) and slightly affects your Resilience (your ability to endure pain and resist illnesses).
LOCAL.soul.label: Soul
LOCAL.soul.value.label: Total Soul
LOCAL.speed.label: Speed
LOCAL.spell.label: Spell
LOCAL.spellTradition.label: Spell Tradition
LOCAL.spells.label: Spells
LOCAL.spend%xResolve.label: Spend %x Resolve
LOCAL.spendResolve.label: Spend Resolve
LOCAL.spent%xResolve.label: Spent %x Resolve
LOCAL.spentResolve.label: Spent Resolve
LOCAL.splash.label: Splash
LOCAL.stamina.label: Stamina
LOCAL.stamina.max.label: Max Stamina = (Body + Mind + Soul)
LOCAL.stamina.desc.label:
Stamina decreases by taking Damage.

When you have no Stamina remaining, any Damage you take increases your Wounds.

You recover all your Stamina when you complete a Short or Long Rest.
LOCAL.staminaAndResolveRestored.label: Stamina and Resolve Fully Restored
LOCAL.staminaHealed.label: Stamina Healed
LOCAL.standardAspects.label: Standard Aspects
LOCAL.static.label: Static
LOCAL.stealth.desc.label: Stealth allows you to remain undetected from other creatures.
LOCAL.stealth.label: Stealth
LOCAL.stride.desc.label: Stride is your speed walking, running, or otherwise moving overland.
LOCAL.stride.label: Stride
LOCAL.stride.value.label: Total Stride Speed
LOCAL.stunned.desc.label:
A Stunned creature can take an Action, or a Move, but not both.

A Stunned creature cannot spend Resolve to take an additional Action.

A Stunned creature's Defense decreases by -1.
LOCAL.stunned.label: Stunned

Your Wounds decrease by -1 when you complete a Long Rest.

SETTINGS.getCheckOptions.label: Ask for Check Options by default.
SETTINGS.getCheckOptions.hint: If true, an options dialog will pop-up when rolling a Check. Hold Shift to toggle this setting.

SETTINGS.confirmDeletingItems.label: Confirm Deleting Items from Actors.
SETTINGS.confirmDeletingItems.hint: If true, a confirmation dialog will be displayed when attempting to delete an Item from an Actor. Can be suppressed by holding shift.

SETTINGS.autoOpenCharacterSheetsPlayer.label: Auto-Open Character Sheets (Player Only)
SETTINGS.autoOpenCharacterSheetsPlayer.hint: Configure whether to automatically open an owned character's sheet on their turn in combat. This setting only applies to Players.

SETTINGS.autoOpenCharacterSheetsGM.label: Auto-Open Character Sheets (GM Only)
SETTINGS.autoOpenCharacterSheetsGM.hint: Configure whether to automatically open an owned character's sheet on their turn in combat. This setting only applies to GMs.

SETTINGS.darkModeChatMessages.label: Dark Mode Chat Messages
SETTINGS.darkModeChatMessages.hint: Enable dark styling for chat messages.

SETTINGS.initiativeFormula.label: Initiative Formula
SETTINGS.initiativeFormula.hint: Optional formula to add to a character's Initiative rating during combat (default is +2d6).

SETTINGS.autoApplyFastHealing.label: Auto-Apply Fast Healing
SETTINGS.autoApplyFastHealing.hint: When enabled, combatants will automatically apply Fast Healing effects at start or end of their turn, depending on the effect. Show Button will instead display a confirmation button in the chat log.

SETTINGS.autoApplyPersistentDamage.label: Auto-Apply Fast Healing
SETTINGS.autoApplyPersistentDamage.hint: When enabled, combatants will automatically apply Persistent Damage effects at start or end of their turn, depending on the effect. Show Button will instead display a confirmation button in the chat log.

SETTINGS.autoRegainResolve.label: Auto-Regain Resolve
SETTINGS.autoRegainResolve.hint: When enabled, a combatant's Resolve will automatically increase at the start of their turn. Show Button will instead display a confirmation button in the chat log.

SETTINGS.autoSpendResolveDoubleTraining.label: Auto-Spend Resolve when Doubling Training
SETTINGS.autoSpendResolveDoubleTraining.hint: When enabled, a combatant's Resolve will automatically be decreased by 1 when they Double Training on a Check.

SETTINGS.autoSpendResolveDoubleExpertise.label: Auto-Spend Resolve when Doubling Expertise
SETTINGS.autoSpendResolveDoubleExpertise.hint: When enabled, a combatant's Resolve will automatically be decreased by 1 when they Double Expertise on a Check.

SETTINGS.autoSpendResolveReRollFailures.label: Auto-Spend Resolve when Re-rolling Failures
SETTINGS.autoSpendResolveReRollFailures.hint: When enabled, a combatant's Resolve will automatically be decreased by 1 when they Re-roll failures on a Check.

SETTINGS.autoSpendResolvechecks.label: Auto-Spend Resolve when using checks
SETTINGS.autoSpendResolvechecks.hint: When enabled, a combatant's Resolve will automatically be decreased when they perform a Check with a resolve cost.

SETTINGS.autoDecreaseEffectDuration.label: Auto-Decrease Effect Duration.
SETTINGS.autoDecreaseEffectDuration.hint: When enabled, a combatant's temporary effects will automatically decrease their duration by 1 at the start or end of their turn, depending on the effect.

SETTINGS.autoRemoveExpiredEffects.label: Auto-Remove Expired Effects
SETTINGS.autoRemoveExpiredEffects.hint: When enabled, expired effects will be automatically removed from a combatant at the start or end of their turn, depending on the effect. Show Button will instead display a confirmation button in the chat log.

SETTINGS.reportTakingDamage.label: Report Taking Damage
SETTINGS.reportTakingDamage.hint: Notify when an actor takes damage.

SETTINGS.reportHealingDamage.label: Report Healing Damage
SETTINGS.reportHealingDamage.hint: Notify when an actor heals damage.

SETTINGS.reportRendingArmor.label: Report Rending Armor
SETTINGS.reportRendingArmor.hint: Notify when an actor's armor is reduced by a rend attack.

SETTINGS.reportRepairingArmor.label: Report Repairing Armor
SETTINGS.reportRepairingArmor.hint: Notify when an actor's armor is repaired.

SETTINGS.reportSpendingResolve.label: Report Spending Resolve
SETTINGS.reportSpendingResolve.hint: Notify when an actor spends Resolve.

SETTINGS.reportRegainingResolve.label: Report Regaining Resolve
SETTINGS.reportRegainingResolve.hint: Report when an actor regains Resolve at the start of their turn.

SETTINGS.reportEffects.label: Report Effects
SETTINGS.reportEffects.hint: Report an character's active Effects at the start of their turn.

SETTINGS.staminaBaseMultiplier.label: Base Stamina Multiplier
SETTINGS.staminaBaseMultiplier.hint: Base Stamina as a multiple of an character's Body + Mind + Soul.

SETTINGS.staminaMinionMultiplier.label: Minion Stamina Multiplier
SETTINGS.staminaMinionMultiplier.hint: Additional multiplier applied to the Base Stamina of Minions.

SETTINGS.resolveBaseMultiplier.label: Base Resolve Multiplier
SETTINGS.resolveBaseMultiplier.hint: Base Resolve as a multiple of an character's Soul.

SETTINGS.woundsBaseMultiplier.label: Base Wounds Multiplier
SETTINGS.woundsBaseMultiplier.hint: Base Wounds as a multiple of an character's Body + Mind + Soul.

SETTINGS.woundsBaseRegain.label: Base Resolve Regain
SETTINGS.woundsBaseRegain.hint: This is the base value by which a combatant's Wounds will be healed when they take a Long Rest.

SETTINGS.resolveBaseRegain.label: Base Resolve Regain
SETTINGS.resolveBaseRegain.hint: When Auto-Regain Resolve is not disabled, this is the base value by which a combatant's Resolve will increase by at the start of their turn.

SETTINGS.confirmRegenerateUUID.label: Confirm Regenerating Unique ID
SETTINGS.confirmRegenerateUUID.hint: A document's Unique ID is generated by the TITAN system on document creation. This ID allows macros to identify a document even if it is duplicated, its name changes, or multiple documents have the same name. It can be regenerated from the context menu by right-clicking the document. When this setting is true, regenerating the Unique ID will require an additional confirmation dialog to avoid accidental regeneration.
